definitions.definition: The sixth month of the Gregorian calendar , following May and preceding July , containing the northern solstice .
A female given name transferred from the month name [in turn from English] , for a girl born in June, used since the end of the 19th century.

main_definition: The sixth month of the Gregorian calendar , following May and preceding July , containing the northern solstice .
secondary_definitions: A female given name transferred from the month name [in turn from English] , for a girl born in June, used since the end of the 19th century.

definitions.definition: A male given name , or more often nickname, for a boy who is junior to someone else, especially someone with the same name, such as his father .

main_definition: A male given name , or more often nickname, for a boy who is junior to someone else, especially someone with the same name, such as his father .
